metadata.title: CVE-2021-45480 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel before 5.15.11. There is amemory leak in the __rds_conn_create() function in net/rds/connection.c ina certain combination of circumstances.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-45480` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.15.0-17-generic - 5.15.0-17.17
